FuncDef:
The description command configures a description for a service-location backup group.
The undo description command deletes the description of a service location backup group.
By default, a service-location backup group is bound to no service-instance-group instance group.

ParaDef.Info:
Description information.
The value is a string of 1 to 64, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo: In CU separation mode, when N:1 warm backup coexists with distributed CGN, to configure the description of a service-location backup group, run the description command.
